message.name: ERR_SAMPLE_SPORTINGSPONSORSHIP_XRV_SPORTINGSPONSORSHIP_EXISTS
message.locale: A Sample Sporting Sponsorship Activity record already exists.

message.name: ERR_SAMPLE_SPORTINGSPONSORSHIP_XRV_AMOUNT_GREARWE_THAN_IC
message.locale: The sporting sponsorship amount must not be greater then the net sporting activity amount. (The net sporting activity amount is the sporting activity amount minus the sporting activity expense amount).

message.name: ERR_SAMPLE_SPORTINGSPONSORSHIP_XRV_SORTINACTIVITY_NOT_LAESS_SPONSORSHIP_EVIDENCE
message.locale: The Sporting Activity Evidence amount should not be less than the Sponsorship Evidence amount.
